moduleMetadataJson.name: Linux Gather Saved mount.cifs/mount.smbfs Credentials
moduleMetadataJson.description:
Post Module to obtain credentials saved for mount.cifs/mount.smbfs in
        /etc/fstab on a Linux system.
author: Jon Hart <jhart@spoofed.org>
